description: This is a front-end JavaScript source file defining a Lightning.js component named 'Home' that renders a homepage with animated logo, loader, and button, using Blits component framework.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A Lightning.js component for the homepage, including animated logo, loader, and button, with lifecycle hooks and state management.

methods.name: rotateColors
methods.description: Cycles through the color array to update loader color at specified intervals.
